COMMIT.MESSAGE: Support recovery for closed shard in N-2 version (#121141) Allow shard recovery for shards in version N-2 that have been verified before being closed, but not verified as read-only, in 7.x or 8.x. Reopening such closed indices automatically adds an index.blocks.write. Requires #120595 for the 8.x changes. Closes ES-10320 Closes #121170 Closes #121171
